website_summaries.verdict: A premium knife bag that looks and performs great in or out of the kitchen.
pros: Designed to store up to 10 knives and utensils
Knife pockets stretch for added convenience
Leather construction protects knives during travel
cons: May be difficult to keep open at times

customer_reviews.title: Executive Chef Endorsement
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping for a knife roll for about a year. I've always wanted leather, but with a newborn baby, I'm on a canvas budget. I bit the bullet and bought this one while only spending $20 more than a comparable canvas counterpart. It's a great bag. The elastic fits on each sleeve are a very nice touch, and the leather is of excellent quality. If you are in the market for a leather knife roll, purchase this one and save $200 to buy another knife to fit into this beautiful roll.
customer_reviews.author: michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel, the quality, the look of this roll. And I love the queries I get from the cooks and chefs I work with. I have a few custom knives and a few fine Japanese blades and one can't carry those around in a polyester bag. It just wouldn't be right. I do believe it should be double stitched because the leather feel like it's going to last for 50 years. And as for water-proofing, just treat it with Armor All leather care as I did and don't leave it on a prep table. You wouldn't do that with a polyester bag anyway. All in all it's great craftsmanship at only $110.00
customer_reviews.author: John Malik

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am SHOCKED by the quality of the leather on this roll, probably alone cost over $60 in materials, not to mention the labor involved. Holds all my knives very securely plus a lot of extra goodies. This leather roll is a steal at $105. If you're considering this versus a cheaper alternative, spend the extra $$$ and you'll never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Sigmonster

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather bag that is so fashionable
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this roll, I was a little worried it would be too bulky/heavy for my boyfriend once he added all his knives and kitchen tools. When he did, however, the little extra weight didn't matter - it was perfect. He absolutely loves it, says its the ideal roll for any chef because it has all the pockets he needs and the cover on the inside along with roll design keeps everything protected. And the leather makes it super durable and fashion forward.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Garren

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a better leather knife roll for this price. Outstanding quality, stitching, space etc. The knife slots will expand for larger handles and are elastic enough to hold smaller knives. One thing I did not realize is this bag is much larger than the photos given. It's a hefty roll, which I like. Not built cheap and in person does not look cheap, quality leather. I cook for a living and I'm proud to pack this bad boy around.
customer_reviews.author: devin b

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fine craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife roll. I’ve owned many cheap ones over the years, and I’m finally proud to walk into work with this bad boy. I haven’t been able to keep a small knife in the top holders, but that shouldn’t be a deal breaker for you. Love the additional leather bag for the small things like boning tweezers and thermos. Get this knife roll...you won’t be let down.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Knife roll
customer_reviews.text: *After using this bag for about a month I can't tell you how many compliments this bag has received.* Like many other reviewers have said this knife roll is excellent. After looking at a ton of products on amazon, ebay and etsy this roll looks as good as the ones that easily cost more than twice as much. The stitching is spot on and the leather is perfect. This thing looks like it should last for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: A truly awesome leather knife roll. Really.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, heavily constructed with awesome detail. I use this everyday in a fast pace kitchen and it's stood up anything I've demanded. Best purchase I've made in awhile. It's going to last for years to come. Thank you for your product and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold 12” cimeter. I have been using this for several months and it has held up great. Should last forever. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Boland

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bag Really Nice, But you have to have is professionally waterproofed it will stain very easily. these type rolls are meant to be for people in the cooking business, you take this bag in the kitchen as is, it Will be ruined/stained in a week. It is much to nice a roll to let that happen, but we know how greasy and messy it gets if you are in the business
customer_reviews.author: Karl A Maynor Sr

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding knife roll fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife roll. It is not only beautiful but it is is very sturdy and durable. It keeps my knives secure and safe. The zippered pocket and extra suede bag hold my small stuff when doing an offsite venue. I’ve had several knife rolls over the years but they have all been nylon and inevitably the knives have worn through the fabric. The craftsmanship on this bag is very nice and the price is fantastic for the quality you receive. I liked it so much that I bought a second one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: De Provence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I love the new knife bag smell. At first it is hard to get the straps to latch when the bag is full but the leather just needs to be broken in a little and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: shana price

customer_reviews.title: The wonderful smell of leather
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift from my girlfriend. I've said before that I wish I had brought my own knife from home when on vacation and so she thought to get me this. I now have it filled with all of my must haves for when I cook both professionally and at home. It holds a significant amount of knives, spatulas, whisks, etc. And is beautifully crafted. If you are a chef and would like to carry your own personal set with you everywhere then I would highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moss

customer_reviews.title: they put all the pocket in 1line
customer_reviews.text: it's okay genuine leather the design inside not really good they put the pocket for the knife in 1 line so you had limited space for this size
customer_reviews.author: Raka petra

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Durable and aesthetically eye catching
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife storage bag for my husband who is a chef! He loves it, he says it is roomy enough, keeps knives in their proper pockets, it is very durable and is also aesthetically pleasing. He has received many compliments on it. We will definitely purchase again for future gifts. Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Straps could be longer
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is that once filled the straps need to be a bit longer. I had to make an extra hole.
customer_reviews.author: tina smith

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the length of the adjustable straps, when items are inserted into roll and rolled for closure the straps are to short. Need longer straps to make this functional.
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Lee Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. The color is a bit lighter than the photo, but I can live with that. The craftsmanship is impeccable and the material inside and out is amazing. I have some Jikko knives with wooden handles that look amazing in this bag. The price is on point. I just got rid of a more expensive bag that kept unrolling on me. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: yekaterina balagian

customer_reviews.title: Straps are longer now
customer_reviews.text: Earlier reviewers mentioned that the straps were too short. Word must have made its way back to the leather workers, because the one I bought in December 2019, after this item had been out of stock for a short while, has good long straps on it, much longer than the pictures showed. This knife roll is so well made and beautiful, I find myself looking for excuses to bring my cooking things with me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in the Northeast

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful , thick, sturdy , easy to use, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful I love it and can't stop filling it full of nice knives I dont even want to touch it ! Also its definitely real leather I looked away for one second and my cat couldn't help but to punch and leave a few marks, she only does that with real leather. I do not regret this purchase what so ever
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Mason

customer_reviews.title: Coolest knife roll in the restaurant!
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest knife roll I’ve ever bought, it definitely gets a ton of compliments and looks great! The 2 straps that hold it together are a bit too thin and are close to breaking AND because it’s leather I’m always trying to not get it dirty. I use my old nylon knife roll for work
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.text: I do not review very many products but this is well worth the time to let you know this is an exceptional value. The quality craftsmanship is well worth the money. I cannot imagine someone serious about their knives being disappointed with purchasing this roll. I can’t imagine there’s a better roll on the market for the investment in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Straps are short not a lot of room for closing with knives in it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and is long enough to hold my shun knives with knife guards on them but the closing straps are kinda short so you might not be able to get all your kitchen accessories in it and get it to close
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended😍
customer_reviews.text: The first glance after I opened the box and boy oh boy i was stunned looking at it I felt in love with it. The bag is same like it looks in picture. The build quality of the bag is excellent. The belt and the small pouch comes along is also good. Just one thing I thought was a weak point is it is heavy and when put all the knife it becomes really heavy. Otherwise I loved the bag. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vedant

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY QUALITY QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I stumbled upon this knife roll! I’ve been holding out for years to find a decent leather roll for a fair price. I was instantly blown away by the quality. I honestly don’t know how they are selling these for $100. This roll could sell for $200-250, it’s that freaking nice. It’s rare that I am pleasantly surprised by any purchase these days with everyone cutting corners to maximize profits, but this goes without saying... this company takes pride in what they do. Thank you so much for THE perfect knife roll. I couldn’t be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then I thought ! But beautifully crafted and is very sturdy and durable. Amazingly detailed and my knives fit great!
customer_reviews.author: xkarafsx

customer_reviews.title: I Love To Cook
customer_reviews.text: When you break this out with a sharp set of German/Japanese knives it’s brings all the girls to the yard. This is top-notch. I’m surprised it wasn’t more expensive. Immediately had to gift one to my favorite chef.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value knife roll
customer_reviews.text: The knife roll came with high quality metal parts that I do not worry about breaking. The roll is gorgeous and comes with plenty of space for your knives. I have been using this for about 3 months now and have not noticed any issues nor will I be expecting anything. I highly recommend this knife roll and have so to a few of my buddies.
customer_reviews.author: RedHippopotamus

customer_reviews.title: Yup, all the 5 star reviews are accurate
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. I bought this for my husband, our family chef. He has a few knives and other kitchen tools he’s partial to, and we used this bag to take his “must haves” on our recent trip. Everything fit, and felt secure. Bag rolls up tight, and shoulder strap is comfortable. The leather looks beautiful, feels like the finest quality, and smells like you just entered a tiny leather shop in Italy. This bag has exceeded expectations, and is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: P.W.

customer_reviews.title: Raving Butcher! Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my butcher boyfriend. He LOVED it! I got it engraved with his last name. This turned out way better than expected. The craftsmanship and quality of the materials were a work of art.
customer_reviews.author: Sittingpretty_Dallas

customer_reviews.title: This deal is Low-key actual insanity.
customer_reviews.text: Interested to see how this holds up to daily use over the next couple of decades. Craftsmanship seems top notch, at a price point so unbelievable that even now I have it in my hands I'm curious if it will hold up over a lifetime as a proper well made (as this seemingly is) leather product would.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Frank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome as all the reviews state. My husband loves it and I was happy to have the leather version available. Thank you to the craftsman! It is so useful and stylish. Always get a complement .
customer_reviews.author: Featherb

customer_reviews.title: Wow 🤩, freaking wow
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this bag 💼 is one of the best crafted pieces of ART I have ever seen. I got it for a friend and he was freaked out. I want one now. The workmanship is museum quality. I want to shake the guy’s hand that made it, and a hug. And make him the best steak 🥩 ever.
customer_reviews.author: Waldemar Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Leather
customer_reviews.text: Bday present for son. His only complaint is that leather is very stiff . Was going to apply saddle soap to soften leather but he takes knife bag to work everyday. Also works 5-6 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: celia abshire

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waiting a long time to buy a leather roll, I’ve had many bags over the years and felt it was time to get one that’ll last me for some time. This bag hold up better than any bag I had before stands out in the kitchen, I would highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dervin Smalls

customer_reviews.title: This bag will last you a long time!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!! Best bag I have ever owned in 20+ years. I bought the leather tan bag, now my wife whi is also a chef want to order one
customer_reviews.author: Duane Duprey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome roll, even better price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this knife roll. I bought it for BBQ tools that did not come with their case. The spatula is big and heavy and it is 18 inches long. This was one of the few rolls that was long enough. It looks great and holds a lot of tools and knives and you can’t beat the price. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and large for my 210mm knives. The material feels nice and sturdy. The only minor thing is thenleather strap feels like itll stretch over time, but Im not an expert so I could be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Splendid crafting.
customer_reviews.text: A delight in craftsmanship; I went with the cheaper canvas option and I am far from dissatisfied. One warning, it’s very large. Awesome product and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tiemissen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect.Excellent workmanship. Just the right size. Looks incredible. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Topher Klein

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d bought this 30 years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away by the quality of this knife roll!! I’ve spent the last 30 years in either professional kitchens or meat rooms and this by far surpassed my expectations. I’ll never have to purchase another roll again it’s made that well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. The leather is fantastic. It was heavier than I expected. But my son, who is a chef, loves it. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL! Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely AMAZING product. I get compliments from everyone who sees it. After having used 3 other rolls, I *FINALLY* have one that I'm proud of.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, only regret is not getting the full leather, but that was cost prohibitive.

customer_reviews.title: Great leather
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my son-in-law he is Very very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bag for my husband as a gift, he loves it. My only observation that might make this bag less functional is that the straps aren’t a snap type buckle, which could make easy open/ close nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband - he loves it. So proud of the knife roll he’s always wanted!

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: First and only knife roll I will ever need. The craftsmanship and materials used are top notch. If you're undecided about whether to purchase, buy it you wont regret it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my chef husband for Christmas because his current knife bag just wasn’t cutting it. He is in LOVE. I would buy this again and again.

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather knife roll bag
customer_reviews.text: Me and my friend bought two leather knife roll bags which are really nice. We are satisfied about them. it's affordable price with these great conditions.

customer_reviews.text: What a great product. This was a gift to my son-in-law and he was blown away. Excellent quality and durability and will last a lifetime. Plenty of storage for chef in the family.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and fashionable.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: what's not to like about a leather knife bag for under $100 this thing is fantastic it looks amazing and holds a good number of knives you just got to take care of it

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for a leather knife roll at 100 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Craftsmanship. Beautiful pieces of leather. I wish they were double stitched like others have said. Best deal for only 100 dollars.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice leather and craftsmanship in this bag. It holds all of my knives and a sharpener in 1 easy to carry tote. I highly recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: The "Cadillac" of knife bags
customer_reviews.text: The "Cadillac" of knife rolls as I like to refer to this bag. Super nice great job

customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I'm very Impressed with the quality of this roll I just love it 🤩

customer_reviews.text: This is a great overall product, very sturdy/ durable. I have been very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for his birthday and he loves it!!

It's bigger and heavier than I expected it to be, so keep that in mind if this will go in your air travel luggage. I bought this to take as a gift for a friend abroad and he was beyond ecstatic!

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great quality knife roll.
customer_reviews.text: A great, durable leather knife roll. Works great for taking my knives to cooking classes! I highly recommend it!! It has plenty of room for storage and looks great, all for a very reasonable price for a quality leather roll.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a chef

customer_reviews.title: perfect knife bag
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves his knife bag, beautifully made. the leather is soft and so durable! highly recommended for any chef. he gets compliments on it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Thanh-Mai

product_meta.title: Leather Knife Roll Storage Bag | Elastic and Expandable 10 Pockets | Adjustable/Detachable Shoulder Strap | Travel-Friendly Chef Knife Case Idea (Caramel (with Bag), Leather)
feature_bullets: Stitched by world-class craftsmen, the Aaron Leather Knife Roll is handcrafted with premium quality Buff Calf Leather.
There are 2 classy vintage buckles that form a tight roll, with stretchable knife pockets and 1 durable zipper pouch to keep the knives secure while you are on the go.
It can be used as a knife storage case - storing 10 kitchen knives and other accessories. It can be used as an utensil holder as well. It can hold knives of up to 18” length.
It is a perfect, classy and thoughtful gift for culinary students, aspiring chefs/professional chefs and tool-users.
